```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
input_data <- read_delim(here("data", "raw", "tblFlandersRedListsAll.tsv"), delim = "\t")

sources <-
  input_data %>%
    mutate(Validated = recode(Validated,
      "NonValidated" = "non-validated",
      "Validated" = "validated",
    )) %>%
    group_by(Validated, TaxonomicGroup, Reference) %>%
    summarize(
      `Taxa` = n()
    ) %>%
    ungroup()
```

## Source red lists

### Validated red lists

```{r echo = FALSE}
sources %>%
  filter(Validated == "validated") %>%
  select(TaxonomicGroup, Reference, Taxa) %>%
  adorn_totals("row")
```

### Non-validated red lists

```{r echo = FALSE}
sources %>%
  filter(Validated == "non-validated") %>%
  select(TaxonomicGroup, Reference, Taxa) %>%
  adorn_totals("row")
```
